8.3. Multivariate CNN Models 99
Figure 8.1: Plot of Multi-headed 1D CNN for Multivariate Time Series Forecasting.
This model requires input to be provided as a list of two elements where each element in the
list contains data for one of the submodels. In order to achieve this, we can split the 3D input
data into two separate arrays of input data; that is from one array with the shape [7, 3, 2]
to two 3D arrays with [7, 3, 1].
# one time series per head
n_features = 1
# separate input data
